item.title: Road flooding, 27th September
item.description:
Whenever we get heavy rain our street floods. The gulleys need cleaning more often as the leaves and sludge from other streets end up in our drains which in turn blocks them. My partners car has unfortunately been affected this time and if it happens again you will be held fully responsible. This is a service we pay for with our council tax.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Gristmill Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 100metre long, 35-40cm wide and 15cm deep pothole around a gulley., 27th September
item.description:
100metre long, 35-40cm wide and 15cm deep pothole around a gulley. No way to avoid as a cyclist or motorcyclist. Once wheel is in this defect, it will be difficult to get out, and the direction it will take the wheel in is straight into the gulley.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Andoversford, Cotswold
